markdownRemark.html:
what we talk about a lot: software development process (i.e. agile development) development tools (i.e. version control system, test coverage tools) programming techniques (i.e. object-oriented programming and functional programming) design patterns algorithms

what we don't talk about as much:

software design

  • how to design programs and what good programs should look like
  • how to take a complex problem and divide it up into pieces that can be solved independently.
  • REDUCE COMPLEXITY: the goal more important than any other principal.

Complexity increases inevitably
